Title: Relates to accurate reporting of crime statistics and excludes certain crime statistics from consideration when making rates of insurance
Summary: Relates to accurate reporting of crime statistics and excludes certain crime statistics from consideration when setting rates of insurance.
LawCode: Add ยง837-t, Exec L; amd ยง2304, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to accurate reporting of crime statistics; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to excluding certain crime statistics from consideration when making rates of insurance
